tooltips.exportIntoSeparateColumns: Related data records will be exported as different fields/columns by using for the name the suffix "_1", "_2" and so on.
tooltips.filterField: Select a filter field if you want to apply a filter on related records.
tooltips.filterFieldValue: Only records filtered by filter field value will be selected.
tooltips.column: You can use related entity fields in the column name. Use the field name in the database as a variable, eg {{name}}. Checkbox "Separate Columns" should be activated.
